channel.title: Comments on: Sticky Date Pudding with Butterscotch Sauce and Almond Praline

item.title: By: April K
item.dc:creator: April K
item.description: Yum! I'm using this recipe to make the sauce now! Love your page!
item.content:encoded:
Yum! I’m using this recipe to make the sauce now!
Love your page!

item.title: By: Jonathan
item.dc:creator: Jonathan
item.description: Tried this recipe several times and a favourite WOWer to show off to friends and family - It is so yummeeeeeeeeeeeee
item.content:encoded: Tried this recipe several times and a favourite WOWer to show off to friends and family – It is so yummeeeeeeeeeeeee

item.title: By: smiley77
item.dc:creator: smiley77
item.description: hi, I love your sticky date look.It's quite tempting at the moment, so I got up & made a fresh batch of sticky date pudding but what I'd like to know is, can I pour the batch into a normal cast iron baking try(that's all I got at the moment) & cook as is without a bain marie? please help!!! thanks.
item.content:encoded: hi, I love your sticky date look.It’s quite tempting at the moment, so I got up & made a fresh batch of sticky date pudding but what I’d like to know is, can I pour the batch into a normal cast iron baking try(that’s all I got at the moment) & cook as is without a bain marie? please help!!! thanks.

item.title: By: banoffee pie
item.dc:creator: banoffee pie
item.description: I have a massive sweet tooth and generally can squeeze something chocolatey in even after a large meal so this is something I am absolutely definitely(!) going to be making soon! thanks for sharing
item.content:encoded: I have a massive sweet tooth and generally can squeeze something chocolatey in even after a large meal so this is something I am absolutely definitely(!) going to be making soon! thanks for sharing

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi everyone :) Thanks for your lovely comments!
Hi Zita - Hehe :) Thanks, I've been enjoying making the dishes, but have a heap more to make.
Hi Zina - Definitely make this, and the custard from the Croquembouche if you don't want to try the whole thing.
Hi Anita - The ramekins are Maxwell Williams ones, I got them a few years ago at Myer.
Hi Belle - :) I've seen a few other recipes from MasterChef, I can't wait to try them.
Hi Lorraine - The praline was a lovely addition.
Hi Y - hehehe, exactly!
Hi Julia - Thanks, and I agree too.
Hi Sophia - Really?! Well, I hope you try it!
Hi Trisha - Mmmm.. ice cream went well with it, and I love butterscotch sauce, so it was a fantastic dessert!
Hi Clekitty - Thanks! :)
Hi Maria - Hmmm, it was nice and moist, not too sticky.
Hi Howard - It is a bit old school, isn't it... It was my first time at this though and it was great.
Hi Arwen - Thanks!
Hi Parita - :) thanks heaps.
Hi Lisa - thanks for the kind words
Hi Rilsta - I hope you get around to making it!!
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone ðŸ™‚ Thanks for your lovely comments!

Hi Zita – Hehe ðŸ™‚ Thanks, I’ve been enjoying making the dishes, but have a heap more to make.

Hi Zina – Definitely make this, and the custard from the Croquembouche if you don’t want to try the whole thing.

Hi Anita – The ramekins are Maxwell Williams ones, I got them a few years ago at Myer.

Hi Belle – ðŸ™‚ I’ve seen a few other recipes from MasterChef, I can’t wait to try them.

Hi Lorraine – The praline was a lovely addition.

Hi Y – hehehe, exactly!

Hi Julia – Thanks, and I agree too.

Hi Sophia – Really?! Well, I hope you try it!

Hi Trisha – Mmmm.. ice cream went well with it, and I love butterscotch sauce, so it was a fantastic dessert!

Hi Clekitty – Thanks! ðŸ™‚

Hi Maria – Hmmm, it was nice and moist, not too sticky.

Hi Howard – It is a bit old school, isn’t it… It was my first time at this though and it was great.

Hi Arwen – Thanks!

Hi Parita – ðŸ™‚ thanks heaps.

Hi Lisa – thanks for the kind words

Hi Rilsta – I hope you get around to making it!!

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: This recipe is marked on my 'must try' list but I haven't had a chance to give it a go. You make it look easy though!
item.content:encoded: This recipe is marked on my ‘must try’ list but I haven’t had a chance to give it a go. You make it look easy though!

item.content:encoded: This looks divine! This is a perfect dessert for my–all my favorite flavors.

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: OMG anita thats incredibly delicious, love the butterscotch sauce..hmmmmmm!
item.content:encoded: OMG anita thats incredibly delicious, love the butterscotch sauce..hmmmmmm!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: That looks great. I love dates in just about anything, but sticky date pudding in particular. The praline looks great too!
item.content:encoded: That looks great. I love dates in just about anything, but sticky date pudding in particular. The praline looks great too!

item.title: By: Howard
item.dc:creator: Howard
item.description: This is such an old school dessert, but it's one of my favourites. It has all the different textures and temperatures which make a good dessert, well done!
item.content:encoded: This is such an old school dessert, but it’s one of my favourites. It has all the different textures and temperatures which make a good dessert, well done!
